title: The Ultimate Business Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Ancient China   Arrogant Characters   Betrayal   Black Belly   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Reincarnation
author: Lan Mei Gui   懒玫瑰
description:
At the execution site, the two hundred and fifteen people of the Yun family are waiting for the execution. As the new emperor ordered, all are executed and the blood flow to the ground….

 Relive again, people who owe her, calculate against her, she will never let them off.

 Just return back to life, her parents murdered, the people in the entire capital are eyeing her family’s wealth. This lifetime, she will not be blinded again.

 In her past life, her uncle’s family is her only family, just because her grandmother don’t like her mother, she thought…>
